header.topics: A pregnant student, a bereaved friend, teaching styles, yoga, gym training, child benefits/salaries for women/motherhood and internet dating.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) in the flat of one of the friends, in Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
